name: Winvesta
description: Winvesta is simplifying access to global investing for Indian investors. You can now open a US stock brokerage account, and an international multi-currency bank account, in as little as 10 minutes right from the app. Whether you want to invest in US stocks at zero-commission, or buy and maintain an international real estate, Winvesta is making it easier for you to build a globally diversified portfolio.

team.name: Prateek Jain
team.bioHtml: Co-founder at Winvesta, Traded Energy Derivatives at Deutsche Bank. Went to IIM Ahmedabad, IIT Kanpur

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.description:
Winvesta is a first of its kind Global Investment Platform for India. It helps Indians invest globally, in companies such as Facebook, Amazon, Google - all with very seamless integration with banking products.

Winvesta  founded by former bankers is headquartered in London with a global footprint across 4 countries. Its senior team includes talent from banking and technology from reputed institutions (IIM-A, IIT-K) that has run multi-billion dollar international investment portfolios across New York, London and Singapore and built trading technology for global hedge funds based out of London and Chicago. 

**What we are looking for:**

* A top-class software developer with hands-on 3+ years of experience working with Android (Java) Development
* Highly motivated candidates with a knack for attention to detail, strong skill set and outstanding individual contributors
* Candidates who are willing to work in a challenging and fast-paced environment and can deliver high quality within strict timelines
* Experts in REST APIs, FCM, deep-linking, notifications, etc. and have experience in deployment to Play Store
* Prior experience in Fintech, Payments, and Wealth-tech is a plus
* Competitive coding experience is an added advantage
* Experience with working on iOS is a plus

**What you will do:**

* Design, build and roll out native Android app
* Play a key role in design sessions, providing expert input, suggestions, and advice on-screen design, screen flow, usability, and overall user experience
* Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application on multiple Android versions and devices
* Bring new ideas and technologies to the table that can improve our product or process

Interested candidates may please fill out the form linked below:
https://form.asana.com?hash=80f10c13d9e63d9291234de7b2bfe1ab5c9be90b480317fa91712e51b385ee32&id=1164410197849005

For more information about our product and team please check out our website https://www.winvesta.in/

jobs.title: Financial Content Writing - Part time
jobs.description:
Winvesta is a first of its kind Global Investment Platform for India. It helps Indians invest globally, in companies such as Facebook, Amazon, Google - all with very seamless integration with banking products.

Winvesta  founded by former bankers is headquartered in London with a global footprint across 4 countries. Its senior team includes talent from banking and technology from reputed institutions (IIM-A, IIT-K) that has run multi-billion dollar international investment portfolios across New York, London and Singapore and built trading technology for global hedge funds based out of London and Chicago. 

Looking for a part time content writer for blog and newsletter for a fintech app. The app allows Indians to invest in US stocks and open an international bank account. Here's the expectation
1. Write 3-4 newsletters every week. 
2. 1-2 blog posts a week. 
3. Find stock images for the articles
4. For the main image, work with our designer to come up with an illustration/graphic.

jobs.title: Social Media Manager - Part Time
jobs.description:
Winvesta is a first of its kind Global Investment Platform for India. It helps Indians invest globally, in companies such as Facebook, Amazon, Google - all with very seamless integration with banking products.

Winvesta  founded by former bankers is headquartered in London with a global footprint across 4 countries. Its senior team includes talent from banking and technology from reputed institutions (IIM-A, IIT-K) that has run multi-billion dollar international investment portfolios across New York, London and Singapore and built trading technology for global hedge funds based out of London and Chicago. 

We need a part time social media manager for facebook, instagram, twitter, and LinkedIn. The company is a fintech platform for Indians. The responsibilities would include
1. Idea and content generation for 6-7 social media posts a week. 2 of these should be original content and 1 should be about our app/product/features. The rest could be informative/topical content sharing.
2. Work with our designer to generate the post creatives
3. Engage with other social media accounts, and promote the account, increase follower count and engagement.
4. Find and work with influencers for promotion, run social media contests, and other promotions.

Expect this to take 8-12 hours per week. The contract can be converted to full time based on the performance and increase in genuine engagement + conversion from followers to customers.

Experience in financial services/fintech content would be a plus
